CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946, pg. 10 reads: "American Bridge Tournament Closes In Pittsburgh - Closing Saturday night in Pittsburgh was one of the most successful of all ABA gatherings, which drew some 500 bridge players to Pennsylvania to spend a week vying for honors...Directors and assistants at the meet were Zelma Coleman, Ruth Lee, James Johnson, Herbert Reed, Carrie Young, Dr. John B. Hall, S. Curriel, Fostina Gregoire and Clarence Polk...All photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, first row from left: Zelma Coleman, Ruth Lee; second row: James Johnson, Herbert Reed, Carrie Young, Dr. John B. Hall; back row: S. Curriel, Fostina Gregoire and Clarence Polk, standing on exterior steps of building for Thirteenth Annual Conference of the American Bridge Association
